title: Okay, what the heck is this?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/wABHzyh.png/img

I call bullshit on the highest possible level.

The image removed was the freaking 3 frame comic of Plague Knight drinking a coffee and talking about his type of woman... I'd post it here right now, but I fear I'd get in trouble again for more "Lol we're gonna randomly remove a thing again!1!! xd xd xd" bad moderation. 

I'm pretty sure you all know the image I'm talking about anyways, if not, a simple google search can find it with ease.

Not only have I posted that image multiple times in the past without causing any harm myself, many others have has well.

So why now, of ALL POSSIBLE TIMES, it is all the suddenly "bad" and I get a warning for it? 

The only reasoning I can get for this is ether I got a lot of nickers knoted in the thread I posted it causing a lot of false reports on the image, that once again, had been fine on boards **multiple times** or the blooming mods were playing "Who are we gonna piss off a random GDer today for no good reason at all" game of selection by a game of drunk darts.
